author: Gremlin
itunes:author: Gremlin
itunes:summary: This episode we speak with Michael Kehoe, a Staff Site Reliability Engineer at LinkedIn. Topics include: Site Reliability Engineering, building satellites at NASA, LinkedIn’s Chaos Engineering project called Waterbear, using Chaos Engineering to test autoscaling, running Chaos Engineering experiments as regression tests in a release pipeline, and tips for starting a Chaos Engineering practice at your company.
